name: Dead Irish Writers Quiz | 'West Wing' - Season 3 | 20 Questions

questions.text: What was the name of the man that recused himself from Abbey's hearing?
questions.explanation:
Robert Nolan.

	He used to work with Abbey.

questions.text: Who said they might want to write a book one day?
questions.explanation:
Amy.

	Amy: "The first lady just asked me to get boozy with her. You don't think I want to write a book one day?"

questions.text: Does Sam know what the definition of matter is?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Sam: "There's a lot of knowledge out there. I may have missed some things."

questions.text: What animal could CJ learn to like?
questions.explanation:
Cat.

	CJ: "I don't hate them."

questions.text: What was the word Sam used to describe what the Super Conductor Super Collider is used for?
questions.explanation:
Discovery.

	Sam: "That's what this is used for."

questions.text: How long was the President out with Charlie working on his speech?
questions.explanation:
45 minutes.

	Jed (about the band playing 'Oh, Canada'): "They were all Americans when I left."

questions.text: How long is Abbey going to forfeit her medical license?
questions.correct: For the duration of their stay in the White House
questions.explanation:
For the duration of their stay in the White House.

	Jed: "Okay."

questions.text: Why did Doctor Millgate say Sam shouldn't have gone into physics?
options: He was afraid Sam would blow something up
He wanted Sam to be a lawyer
questions.explanation:
Sam was bad at it.

	Sam: "I just needed a little encouragement."

questions.text: Josh was on 'Crossfire'.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Josh: "It was Sam, but as long as you heard I was great."

questions.text: According to Amy, what percentage of women make up the vote?
questions.explanation:
60.

	Amy: "Don't ya think they should make up forty-percent of the campaign staff?"

questions.text: If women were the only voters, what party would they vote for?
questions.explanation:
Democratic.

	Amy: "If men were the only voters, the GOP would be the left-wing party."

questions.text: Which one of the Senior Staff did Leo have talk to Lord John Marbury about Brendan McGann?
questions.explanation:
Toby.

	LJM: "I am John, Lord Marbury, Earl of Croy, Marquirsof Neadum and Dolby, Baronette of Brison, England's Ambassador to the United States. A terrorist is a terrorist even if he wears a green neck tie and sings Danny Boy. Yes, you can call me John."

questions.text: Was Donna a U.S. citizen?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Donna: "I missed it by four miles."

questions.text: What food did Josh bring Donna?
questions.explanation:
Olives.

	Donna: "Go away. Give me the olives."

questions.text: How many jokes did the President tell about Abby's problem?
questions.explanation:
24.

	Abby: "It's not like the other 23 weren't funny."

questions.text: Who is Gerald?
questions.explanation:
Leo.

	Jed: "I'm pretty sure he means Leo."

questions.text: Abbey wanted a formal party.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Jed: "I kinda wish you'd mentioned that before."

questions.text: What part of Abbey's body did Lord John Marbury constantly speak about?
questions.explanation:
Breast.

	LJM: "Might I inquire Mr. President? The first thing that attracted you to Abigail, was it her magnificent breasts?"

questions.text: Who told Sam he could wear a tuxedo?
questions.explanation:
CJ.

	Sam: "I know."

questions.text: Have they ever mixed politics with the President's family and gotten good results?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Leo: "Me neither and I've been at this a lot longer."
